summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 37th Avenue from East Cherry Street to a point 90 feet north of East Spring Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7725 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
